predicate.note: Frames file for 'unsettle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: nasty syntax
example.text: What is it, to borrow a term from Coniston, that *trace* so unsettled the market?

example.name: adjectival usage, but tag
example.text: William Rothe, head of OTC trading at Alex . Brown & Sons, in Baltimore, said program trading is keeping the markets unsettled.

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: [John]-1 was sorely unsettled *trace*-1 by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie.
example.arg: by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie
